\section{Global Emissions by Sector, Fuel, and Region}

\begin{figure}[!ht]
  \centering
  \includegraphics[width=0.6\paperheight]{Paper_Figures_RCP_Comparison_stacked_fuel 3x3_legend.pdf}
  \caption{CEDS emissions estimates by aggregate fuel compared to Lamarque et al. (2010) (dots) and CDIAC for CO2. For like with like comparison, these figures do not include aviation, or agricultural waste burning on fields. Format is similar to Figures 2 and 3 in the the main text.}
\end{figure}
